@graph.caption: slices of lemony multigrain loaf on a blue plate

@graph.name: Lemony Multigrain Mini Loaf! (Vegan) - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: Lemony multigrain loaf a refreshing mildly sweet bread with endless possibilities.. It makes for a great snack with Jams and Marmalade, or fresh tomatoes,basil and vegan cheese. Vegan Recipe.

@graph.name: Lemony Multigrain Mini Loaf
@graph.description: Lemony multigrain loaf a refreshing mildly sweet bread with endless possibilities.. It makes for a great snack with Jams and Marmalade, or fresh tomatoes,basil and vegan cheese. Vegan Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1 tablespoon canola oil or vegan butter

recipeInstructions.text: Warm 1/2 cup (250ml) water, add sugar and yeast to it. Let rest for 10 minutes or until frothy.
recipeInstructions.name: Warm 1/2 cup (250ml) water, add sugar and yeast to it. Let rest for 10 minutes or until frothy.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the quinoa flour or coarsely ground quinoa, 3/4 cup bread flour, whole wheat flour, salt, zest, lemon juice, oil and knead for 5-6 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the quinoa flour or coarsely ground quinoa, 3/4 cup bread flour, whole wheat flour, salt, zest, lemon juice, oil and knead for 5-6 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in more warm water or bread flour if needed to make into a soft not too sticky dough.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in more warm water or bread flour if needed to make into a soft not too sticky dough.

recipeInstructions.text: Place dough in well oiled container where it can double in volume. Spritz top of dough with water and cover with heavy towel.
recipeInstructions.name: Place dough in well oiled container where it can double in volume. Spritz top of dough with water and cover with heavy towel.

recipeInstructions.text: Using little flour, knead the dough and shape into an inch thick 2 rectangular shapes. Roll up the rectangle and place the loaf seam side down in the mini loaf pans.
recipeInstructions.name: Using little flour, knead the dough and shape into an inch thick 2 rectangular shapes. Roll up the rectangle and place the loaf seam side down in the mini loaf pans.

recipeInstructions.text: Spritz top with water. Sprinkle some poppy seeds on top(optional). Press them a bit then spritz top with oil spray. Cover the pans with towel and let rise for 45 minutes
recipeInstructions.name: Spritz top with water. Sprinkle some poppy seeds on top(optional). Press them a bit then spritz top with oil spray. Cover the pans with towel and let rise for 45 minutes

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 365 degrees F for 25-30 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 365 degrees F for 25-30 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove from pan and let cool before slicing! This soft and refreshing minis are headed to Susan's Weekly YeastSpotting!
recipeInstructions.name: Remove from pan and let cool before slicing! This soft and refreshing minis are headed to Susan's Weekly YeastSpotting!

@graph.keywords: fruit bread, multigrain bread, vegan bread recipe
